interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare
Review Date: 2020/08/14
Store: Higher Education
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'}
Review Text: I need a good face scrub to clean out the pores but it needs to be gentle at the same time to not inflame my skin. This scrub didn't really irritate my skin but the granules in the scrub are very rough. I found it to be more so than other scrubs I've used. Thankfully, it didn't irritate my skin. I just had to be extra gentle. That said, my skin was smooth again so it does work.
Review Title: Interesting texture
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Bloomy Essentials Top 3 Organic Essential Oils Starter Set 10 mL (1/3 oz) - USDA Certified Organic - 100% Pure Lavender, Lemon and Peppermint
Bloomy Essentials
{'Brand': 'Bloomy Essentials', 'Scent': 'Lemon,Peppermint,Lavender', 'Special Feature': 'Pure', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 3.6 x 1.2 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912084567', 'Manufacturer': 'Bloomy Essentials'}
I use essential oils for many purposes and this 3 piece set is a great starter kit for those who love lavender, lemon and peppermint. They smell great and are very versatile. Mix them with your favorite oil (I like coconut) and apply topically or add a few drops to a diffuser for a peaceful night sleep. I recently had a cold and mixed the peppermint and coconut oil and applied to my chest for a cough. It was soothing and helped with the sinuses as well. Makes a great gift because it comes in a cute little box as well.
Nice starter kit
Folora 4pcs Premium 1 Inch Wide Solid Color Floral Plaid Headband Set for Women Girls, Pink
Folora
{'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Brand': 'Folora', 'Product Dimensions': '4.72 x 0.98 x 5.51 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FLR-HB-4pcs Pink'}
I ordered the pink headband set and these are really cute styles. The material is good and the band fits my small head well. If your head was on the larger side, they'd stretch but might feel tight behind the ears. They're durable and will keep my hair in place.
Small but cute
DROP THE BOMB Bbosong Sun Stick SPF50+ PA++++ 15g - Oil Free UVA/UVB Protection Sebum Control Skin Smooth Moisturizing Sunblock Stick Balm without Sticky, Primer before Makeup
DROP THE BOMB

I was not able to use this product as intended since it was in several pieces when it arrived. I liked that it was spf50 to protect the skin on my face but unfortunately, I can't use it.
Broken in pieces

I need a good face scrub to clean out the pores but it needs to be gentle at the same time to not inflame my skin. This scrub didn't really irritate my skin but the granules in the scrub are very rough. I found it to be more so than other scrubs I've used. Thankfully, it didn't irritate my skin. I just had to be extra gentle. That said, my skin was smooth again so it does work.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Focuses on essential oils and their versatile applications, values natural and organic products, and explores complementary accessories for personal style and wellness. Recently, there has been a deepening interest in skincare products, emphasizing the need for effective and gentle formulations.
  
- **Usage Patterns:** Utilizes oils for personal care and ambiance, showcasing a multi-faceted approach to wellness. A recent challenge with a skincare item underscored a desire for reliable products that promote skin health without irritation.

- **Types of Products Preferred:** Displays a preference for starter sets in essential oils, fashionable accessories, and reliable skincare options, reflecting a keen interest in both personal expression and effective wellness solutions.

- **Favorite Scents:** Enjoys fresh and soothing fragrances, particularly lavender, lemon, and peppermint, aligning with a holistic wellbeing ethos.

- **Application Methods:** Likes to mix oils with carrier oils for topical use and appreciates stylish accessories that complement her wellness lifestyle. Engages thoughtfully with skincare, seeking gentle yet effective products.

- **Social Aspect:** Values aesthetically pleasing and shareable products, identifying gifts that resonate with both wellness and fashion.

- **Overall Rating Behavior:** Generally provides favorable reviews but has expressed concerns regarding product integrity and effectiveness when expectations are not met. Prioritizes quality, aesthetic appeal, and satisfaction in her wellness journey.

The user embodies a holistic lifestyle, merging wellness through natural means with stylish, functional accessories and a reliable skincare regimen.
